metadata.description: It's been 12 years since Robin Hood saved Marian and restored Richard to the throne. Is he living happily ever after? Of course not. Robin is a drunk and he's left behind everyone who cared for him. Then he finds out that Marian has been jailed by the Inquisitor and charged with being a witch.  Can he get back in shape to save her? Does she need saving?
metadata.name: Demons of Sherwood
